description: Describes details about resources that were affected by the activity/event.
caption: Resource
name: resource

owner.description: The identity of the service or user account that owns the resource

resource_type.description: The resource type, normalized to the caption of the resource_type_id value. In the case of 'Other', it is defined by the event source.

resource_type_id.description: The normalized type identifier of the Resource.

uid.description: The unique identifier of the resource.

version.description: The version of the resource. For example 1.2.3.
